name: og-image-rest-generator
description: free and powerful tool that simplifies the process of generating Open Graph images for your website or application

scripts.build: apt-get install build-essential libcairo2-dev libpango1.0-dev libjpeg-dev libgif-dev librsvg2-dev

author: Imam Ali Mustofa <d.darkterminal@gmail.com> (https://github.com/darkterminal)
